title: [QC]一键带你领略1.7.2的巨型生物群落
author: quentinchan
txt_content:
好吧，看到某冰神的代码，发现我之前发那个简直弱爆了，原来命令方块矿车还能Riding，于是乎做了这个火箭车2.0
只要拉下拉杆，超神的火箭车就会勇往直前，带你领略1.7.2奇妙的巨型生物群落地图【放大版地图有人卡，这次就搞个不卡的】





代码在这里：

summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~3 ~ 
{Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Command:"setblock ~26 ~-2 ~ minecraft:redstone_block 0 replace"},
Command:"setblock ~25 ~-2 ~ minecraft:redstone_block 0 replace"},
Command:"setblock ~26 ~-1 ~ minecraft:activator_rail 0 replace"},
Command:"setblock ~25 ~-1 ~ minecraft:golden_rail 0 replace"},
Command:"setblock ~-3 ~-1 ~ minecraft:air 0 destroy"},
Command:"setblock ~-4 ~-1 ~ minecraft:air 0 destroy"},
Command:"setblock ~-3 ~-2 ~ minecraft:air 0 destroy"},
Command:"setblock ~-4 ~-2 ~ minecraft:air 0 destroy"},
Command:"summon PrimedTnt ~-12 ~-2 ~"}复制代码。
